code: import React from"react";import{CurrentUserContext}from"../contexts/CurrentUserContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=props.card.owner._id===currentUser._id;var isLiked=props.card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardRemoveButtonClassName="card__remove-button ".concat(isOwn?"":"card__remove-button_hide");var cardLikeButtonClass="card__like-button ".concat(isLiked?"card__like-button_on":"");var cardImage=props.card.link;var cardName=props.card.name;var likes=props.card.likes.length;function handleClick(){props.onCardClick(props.card);}function handleLikeClick(){props.onCardLike(props.card);}function handleRemoveClick(){props.onRemoveClick(props.card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"cards__list-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleRemoveClick,className:cardRemoveButtonClassName,type:"button"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"card__image",onClick:handleClick,alt:cardName,src:cardImage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card__title",children:cardName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__like-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:cardLikeButtonClass,onClick:handleLikeClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card__like-counter",children:likes})]})]})]})});}export default Card;
